name: Speedrunner
description: Blow up the reactor within 8 minutes.
guide: Disable Auto Scram.
Disable Main Circ Pumps and isolation valves, withdraw rods as fast as possible.
Explode the reactor within 8 minutes.

name: What?
description: "What?"
guide: Climb on top of the first cooling tower (left relative to train tracks).
Turn left and walk around the cooling tower until you see a floppa cube.
Push the floppa.

name: #1 Enemy of Staff Morale
description: Throw all the pizza into the spent fuel pool.
guide: Grab all pizza from the staff cafeteria (repeatedly touch the pizza circle).
Head to the Reactor Hall.
Look for a water pool on your right when entering.
Drop pizzas in your inventory into the pool (press backspace).

name: Deep Fried
description: Make contact with live wires in the bridge circuit room.
guide: Go to either generator bridge circuit room (left/right of Turbine Sub Level).
Go behind the breakers, away from the barrier.
Jump up and down until you get electrocuted by hitting the wires.

name: Sufficiently Ionized
description: Reach a fatal dosage of ionizing radiation.
guide: Go to a radiation source (spent fuel pools or reactor hall).
Stay there until your dosimeter reads 600 rem.

name: Power to the People
description: Connect to the grid and deliver power.
guide: Successfully sync a turbine and start producing positive power.

name: BOOP!
guide: Go to the turbine hall entrance (next to control room).
Take the south stairwell and climb to the top.
Turn left and go through the door.
Walk forward until you see a blue furry plushy, click it (may need multiple tries).

name: Floor Pizza
description: Kinda gross, ngl
guide: At the elevators in the entrance, head to level 2.
Take the door on the far left.
Look left until you see pizza with a wet sign.
Touch and eat the loose pizza slice.

name: You're Fired!
description: Fail to produce any power within 48 hours.
guide: Don't make any power for 2 days.

name: 7 Nights at Oakridge
description: Complete a whole week at the plant.
guide: Successfully produce power and maintain the reactor for 7 days without meltdowns.

name: By the Book
description: Reach 100% efficiency while meeting demand.
guide: Reach 100% efficiency by lowering bypass usage on turbine while meeting demand.
Lower reactor power in 50 MW increments until bypass is fully closed (requires Auto Bypass).

name: Teamwork? Sounds Like a Liability
description: Complete an entire shift all on your own.
guide: Complete a shift by yourself without exploding/melting the reactor.

name: GET ME FEEDWATER!
description: Don't always take things at face value.
guide: Toggle the red/grey switches on the end of the operator panel.
When the reactor water level line graph shows a straight line, click on it multiple times.

name: Energy Tycoon
description: Sell over 20 gigawatt-hours of power in one day.
guide: Sell a total of 20000 MW of power in a single day.
Check power sold above the condensate pump panel.

name: OSHA would be proud
description: Safely shut down the reactor without mishap.
guide: Reach the end of a shift and receive the shutdown call.
Follow the shutdown checklist.
Ensure systems are properly configured before inspection: Turbine Gear engaged for both turbines, Breaker 18M-G1 is off, Offline Core Cooling and OCC pumps enabled.
Receive the badge if all criteria are met.

name: Junior Operator
description: Hope you were paying attention.
guide: Reach 75,000 total points as an operator.

name: Senior Operator
description: You've proven yourself in the art of reactor operation.
guide: Gain 500,000 total points as an operator.

name: Supervisor
description: Share your wisdom and guide your peers to success!
guide: Earn a total of 1,250,000 points as an operator.

name: Shift Manager
description: Middle management, maximum ego.
guide: Reach a total of 2,500,000 points as an operator.

name: Plant Director
description: Certified to blame others when things explode.
guide: Reach a total of 5,000,000 points as an operator.
